attributes.action: We want MPs to refuse to invoke Article 50 and vote to keep the UK in the EU.
attributes.additional_details: The referendum was advisory only, with no legal requirement for parliament to act to implement its decision. In light of many Leave voters now expressing regret and shock at the potential economic and political repercussions of their vote, and the Leave campaign admitting their promises to the public may not be upheld, we call upon MPs to act in the manner they believe to be the best for the United Kingdom.
attributes.background: We the undersigned call upon MPs to exercise their parliamentary sovereignty and act in the best interests of the nation in voting to keep the UK in the EU.
